entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, and he is feeling miserable due to a dementor attack. He is also guilty for being irritable with his owl Hedwig.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl, who is described as the only friend he has at number four, Privet Drive. She is also mentioned to be eating a frog.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is one of Harry's friends who will write back to him with answers and sympathy after the dementor attack. He is mentioned as someone who will help Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another one of Harry's friends who will write back to him with answers and sympathy after the dementor attack. He is mentioned as someone who will help Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who will write back to him with answers and sympathy after the dementor attack. She is mentioned as someone who will help Harry.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is where Harry lives, and it's mentioned that Hedwig is his only friend there.

relationships.description: Harry has a friendship with Hedwig, who is described as his only friend at number four, Privet Drive.
Harry expects Sirius to write back with sympathy and plans for his immediate removal to the Burrow after the dementor attack.
Harry expects Ron to write back with sympathy and plans for his immediate removal to the Burrow after the dementor attack.
Harry expects Hermione to write back with sympathy and plans for his immediate removal to the Burrow after the dementor attack.
